Title: Relates to returning the state's energy codes to earlier provisions; repealer
Summary: Returns the state's energy codes to the less expensive earlier provisions; repeals provisions of the state energy conservation construction code which relate to the state's clean energy and climate agenda.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to returning the state's energy codes to the 2020 provisions; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating to the state energy conservation construction code
